channel.title: Home on Brandarchist
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Brandarchist

item.title: Artificial Intelligence
item.description:
Every day, we have conversations with ourselves. Our meat suit with simple directives like “don’t die” and “reproduce.” Everything else, as RuPaul put it, is drag.

What would we learn from reverse engineering the human experience only to rebuild it from silicon?

–brandarchist

item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description:
From experimentation frameworks to creative automation pipelines, this CV highlights work that bridges product, research, and storytelling. Below is a style board that exercises the common typography and component treatments in the Hugo Blog Awesome theme.

Typography Palette

Body copy lands at a comfortable reading width so long-form case studies feel calm and confident. Inline bold, italic, monospace, and a combo of bold italic text all render with clear contrast on both light and dark modes.

item.title: Intellectual Property
item.description: We cover open-source policies, licensing recommendations, and best practices for keeping ideas shareable without losing the rights that matter most.
